Text: RE Data RoomsThank you Marie Looks like things will be quite today Mari Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Thursday December AM To Capestany Mari Subject Data Rooms Hi Mari I have prepared the separate phone list for each bidder room and am going to place five copies of each on the tables by the boxes in each room Let either Genia FitzGerald x or me x know if you need anything We will have our assistants bring coffee etc so if you will let us know when the groups arrive at the data room we will take care of that Thanks Marie
Redacted Informationpst Louise Attached is an index showing the information that was redacted by legal Mari

Updated data room index Cc Louise Looks like I missed you at noon I apologize for the room mix up Attached is a consolidated data room index organized by box Because of counterparty sensitivity legal has pulled out some of the counterparty specific information We are happy to sit down with you this afternoon or tomorrow if you would like to walk through the documents in greater detail Regards Mari x

Due Diligence Contacts Cc Louise Attached is a list of the contact people that were used during NetCos phase I due diligence I understand that you and John Lavarato may want to funnel questions and data requests from bidders through a smaller group of people Can you please let me know if you would like to make any changes to this list Suzanne Vann and I will be responsible for taking bidders requests and getting the appropriate contact person to meet with them Thank you Mari

Data Room Process Cc Just a quick reminder to send your data room reports to me by this afternoon Please indicate a responsible party for each report who can address bidders specific questions In addition let us know if the information is view only or available for copying All hardcopies should be delivered to Esmeralda Gonzalez at ECN multiple copies should be noted A data room will be set up in ECN C Many of the data room reports have already been indexed by legal The plan will be to distribute a complete index tomorrow for your review Thank you Mari Capestany x

Maple Leaf Attendeespst Below is a list of Maple Leafs due diligence team Joe Hegener CEO TD Securities USA Inc Mark Healy CFO TD Securities USA Inc Tony Solomon Managing Director Corporate Development George Laub Managing Director Group Head Mergers Acquisitions Raj Syal Managing Director Human Resources Julian Bott Managing Director Group Head Select Industries Anthony Hull Managing Director Derivatives Ross MacDonald VP Director Global Technology Mari

Maple Leafspst I dont know what happened to my previous message but here are the details TD Securities is sending a team of people to the data room tomorrow morning They should arrive between and Wednesday morning and stay through Thursday evening They are planning on a late night on Wed We are currently planning on using room for the data room but are looking for another room that might be more accomodating for such a large group I will send you a list of TDs team members as soon as I get it Please let me know who your point person will be and the schedule for the initial meetings Thanks Mari x

The Maple Leafspst I have been notified that TD Securities will be coming Wednesday morning for due diligence on NetCo They will arrive between and am with a team of people and plan on being here through Thursday night I will be coordinating things for them on the corp dev side Please let me know who your commercial coordinator is and the schedule for the first day presentations The data room is currently located in ECN however we are trying to find a room that would be more accomodating for such a large group I will send you the names and titles of TDs team as soon as I get it Thanks Mari Capestany x

RE The Maple Leaves Cc We are running about minutes behind schedule Can you please come later than your originally scheduled presentation time Location is still Please call if you have any questions Mari Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday January AM To Kitchen Louise Lavorato John Colwell Wes Port David Buy Rick Bradford William S Beck Sally Hall Bob M Webb Jay Rub Jenny Oxley David Cc Muller Mark S Capestany Mari Martin Thomas A Lavorato John Schoppe Tammie Subject The Maple Leaves This has got to be the last time Tomorrow morning a new team will arrive for due diligence purposes Tom Martin will be hosting this team The Schedule outline is based on initial overview discussionspresentations and then more detailed discussion can occur in individual groups the outline is as follows It may be better to split up earlier but I leave all those decisions to Tom Introduction John Lavorato Louise Kitchen Financial Overview Wes Colwell Risk Overview Buy Port Credit Bradford Back Office BeckHall Systems EnronOnline Jay Webb MidBack Office Systems Jay Webb Infrastructure Jenny Rub Bob HR Oxley Afternoon Dataroom and Trader discussions Please make yourselves available Tammie please check availability Thanks for your continued understanding The Maple Leaf is sending a team of people They should arrive between and Wednesday morning and stay through Thursday evening They are planning on a late night on Wed We are currently planning on using room for the data room but are looking for another room that might be more accomodating for such a large group Please let me know who your point person will be and the schedule for the initial meetings Louise Louise Kitchen Chief Operating Officer Enron Americas Tel Fax
